message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product for sale. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire something valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but $9500 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit higher than $11000. I'm willing to go up to $10500. Can you consider that?
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated for the product. I'm counteroffering at $11500.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $11250. That's the highest I'm willing to go. Can you accept that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than my last offer. I'm willing to make one final counteroffer at $11750. This is the absolute maximum I'm willing to go.
